answers.answer: I get that a lot but no headaches. he doctors just said nothing wrong. I am falling a few times a month. I can't walk a straight line . but hey say nothing. I guest I will have to live with it. I am diagnose with virago, neuropathy, bi polar. and anything else they can make up, with no treatment but more pills.

question: I was recently hospitalized ER for severe loss of balance, headache (sudden) at forehead and back if head. Cold sweats and near syncope. MRI with and without contrast showed white matter with micro vascular ischemic changes. I an 70 y/o female with HBP, High cholesterol. No diabetes. Dr. Gave me Valium upon discharge. Did I have  a TIA ?
title: Is this a TIA?
